Package jparsec.observer

Provides the necessary tools for selecting and managing location data.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    City
    A convenient class for city data management.
    CityElement
    An adequate class for city data access.
    Country
    Convenient class for country selection.
    EarthOrientationParameters
    A class to obtain the current Earth Orientation Parameters as defined by the IERS.
    ExtraterrestrialObserverElement
    A class to instantiate an observer outside the Earth, as a previous step to calculate ephemerides.
    LocationElement
    This is a convenience class used for passing around polar coordinates.
    Observatory
    A convenient class for observatory data management.
    ObservatoryElement
    An adequate class for storing data from an observatory.
    ObserverElement
    An adequate class for storing the position of an observer as a previous step to calculate ephemerides.
    ReferenceEllipsoid
    A class to apply geodetic/geocentric coordinates transformations using different reference ellipsoids.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description

Package jparsec.observer Description

Provides the necessary tools for selecting and managing location data.

This package is suitable to access data for cities and observatories. An ObserverElement object can be instantiated from a city or an observatory, or created using a constructor, to store the different fields of the selected location and to do later all calculations referred to this position and conditions.
